
= OpenWRT =

  * Sources
  {{{
  svn co svn://svn.openwrt.org/openwrt/branches/8.09 kamikaze
  }}}
  * Packages
  {{{
  cd kamikaze
  ./scripts/feeds update -a
  }}}


= Dependencies =

  * libjson  
  {{{
  ./scripts/feeds install libjson
  }}}


= Build = 

  * Configure:
  {{{
  make menuconfig
  # Global build settings -> Select all packages by default 
  }}}
  
  * Build
  {{{
  make world
  }}}
